name: Mall Enterprises
description: Trader & Supplier of Industrial Coal, Co
overview:
“M/s. Mall Enterprises” commenced its operation in the 2011. Engaged in offering trading, handling & transporting services for premium quality Coal & Lignite. The company produces Non-Coking Coal and Coking Coal of various grades for diverse applications. Most of their coal production is from open cast mines.

Our Products: Coking Coal Industrial Coal Coal Dust Industrial Minerals

Our Team: We are backed by a team of well versed professionals, who help us in developing a wide range of coal and coal dust. These professionals are well versed with the various coal types and their usages as well as their procurement procedures.

Our Quality Assurance: Our entire reputation and credibility is building upon the highest quality standards that are executed in our organization all our products and services are praised by the clients for being cost-effective and of international quality. For ensuring the consistency in our product quality, we undertake extensive research in choosing the right vendors.

Vendor Base: We are a renowned importer and trader of a comprehensive range of Coal and Lignite. In order to provide premium quality products to our clients, we undertake extensive research to identify credible vendors in India.
